title: Shenandoah National Park: Plan A Field Trip
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips     Plan A Field Trip                  Plan A Field Trip                         Planning Your Field Trip To Shenandoah Watch this short video to learn about the topics you can explore during a field trip, how you can start planning, and what to expect once you get out in the park with your group.  Duration:5 minutes, 49 seconds           Â    Shenandoah National Park offers a variety of field trip opportunities. Planning ahead and preparing your group will help make the park visit a memorable, fun, and safe learning experience for you and your students. Check out our Suggestions for A Successful Field Trip to have the best field trip ever. Directions to Shenandoah National Park
